thread.title: See how Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield recovered from losing a Golden Globe
thread.title_full: See how Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield recovered from losing a Golden Globe - TODAY.com

author: Randee Dawn
title: See how Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield recovered from losing a Golden Globe
text:
Hey, we can't all be best actor in a comedy or musical winners at the Golden Globes.
That can only be Ryan Gosling, at least this year, who won for "La La Land."
But that didn't stop fellow nominees Ryan Reynolds ("Deadpool") and Andrew Garfield ("Hacksaw Ridge") from giving themselves (and us, thanks to a handy camera angle) the best possible consolation prize.
A smooch!
Ryan Gosling wins award for bes...Wait! Is that Ryan Reynolds? pic.twitter.com/QLwKKniDSi
— GQ Magazine (@GQMagazine) January 9, 2017 More Awards videos 0:43 See all of Meryl Streep’s Golden Globe-nominated roles 2:13 ‘La La Land’ expected to hit all the right notes at Golden Globes 3:01 Why do celebs walk the red carpet before award shows? 3:10 Hey Girl, will Ryan Gosling win a Golden Globe for ‘La La Land’? Reynolds was nominated alongside Gosling; Garfield was nominated in the drama category later on, though he lost to Casey Affleck ("Manchester by the Sea").
RELATED: Golden Globes 2017: See all the highlights and best moments
Yep, as Gosling strode up to the stage Sunday to give his sweet acceptance speech , down in the audience sat the two "losers" who we think were actually winners ... because they planted one on each other's lips.
Getty Andrew Garfield (left) and Ryan Reynolds shared a memorable moment at the Golden Globes. RELATED: Best Golden Globes tweets, Instagrams: Celebrities share behind-the-scenes pics
Way to steal the spotlight in the best possible way, guys! You're winners in our book.
Follow Randee Dawn on Twitter .
